text: In his epic quest to recieve Khorne's blessing the tribal chieftain of the Aesling unravels in to a flurish of swirling axes in pursuit of fresh skulls to harvest.
Banished from the lands of Norsca by the Aesling, Einarr ''Steelfist'' Sigdansson reassembles his Baersonling kin as he vows to reclaim what is theirs.
The High King of the Bjornling keeps one eye on the realms of men and one eye on his Northern kin as he manouvres on thin ice in search of power.
The treacherous deciever Sayl the Faithless pledges allegiance to nothing but his own far reaching and ominous ambitions.
The Reaver of the Nine Wastes roams the edges of mortal plains in an effort to unify Kurgan tribes and swarm the lands of men.
The mutant Birna, huntress of the Kali Delta, is akin to a shieldmaiden of the old sagas, a woman who seizes her own glories by her own hand.
The marauding Icefang Tribe followed the Wielder of the Great Axe to the coasts of Albion, where new pillaging conquests await.
With ambitions to unify all the Northern Tribes under one Kingdom the immense champion known as Harald Whyrlas starts his unnerving journey.
